text: Can we restore a default value of a field of a module? I've got a text field (`text_field`) with a default value (`Mydefault value`); if the field is edited in the editor, and if I replace the value of `text_field` by `Another value` , can I do something like this (I have a boolean in my module called `restore_text_field` ) : `{% if module.restore_text_field %}{% set text_field = text_field_default_value %}{% endif %}{{ text_field }}`? If the boolean is choosen, I restore the default value in the editor. [EDIT] I find in the fields.json file of modules a key called "default" in each field set of data. But how can I get it in my module with Hubl?
